trans-unit.source: Represents the context for the validation of an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref>.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.BindValidationContext"></xref> class, while initializing the <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the target of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the target of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref>.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.BindValidationContext"></xref> class, initializing the <xref href="System.Type"></xref> and the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.AccessTypes"></xref> of the target of the bind represented by this instance.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the target of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref> represented by this instance.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.AccessTypes"></xref> of the target of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref> represented by this instance.
Is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.AccessTypes"></xref> of the target of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref> represented by this instance.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.AccessTypes"></xref> of the target of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref> represented by this instance.
Gets the <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the target of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref> represented by this instance.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the target of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref> represented by this instance.
